name: handled-tenant-agent
description: Unified Tenant Agent for HANDLED - consolidates concierge, storefront, marketing, and project-hub capabilities

scripts.deploy: npm run build && npx adk deploy cloud_run --project=${GOOGLE_CLOUD_PROJECT:-handled-484216} --region=${GOOGLE_CLOUD_LOCATION:-us-central1} --service_name=tenant-agent
scripts.deploy:dry-run: npm run build && npx adk deploy cloud_run --project=${GOOGLE_CLOUD_PROJECT:-handled-484216} --region=${GOOGLE_CLOUD_LOCATION:-us-central1} --service_name=tenant-agent --dry-run
